system.description:
Like the other forms of pipe gun, the pipe revolver is a makeshift or homemade gun, in this case modelled after a revolver. It strikes a balance between the stopping power of the pipe bolt–action, and the fire rate of the pipe gun, and its improvised nature makes it similarly suited for modification.

A Pipe Revolver can accept one each of the following mods. Any Stock mods add “Rifle” to the end of the weapon’s name.

  • Receiver: Calibrated, Hardened, Powerful, .38 Receiver, .308 Receiver
  • Barrel: Long Barrel, Ported Barrel, Finned Barrel
  • Grip: Sharpshooter’s Grip
  • Stock: Full Stock, Marksman’s Stock, RecoilCompensating Stock
  • Sights: Reflex Sight, Short Scope, Long Scope, Short Night Vision Scope, Long Night Vision Scope, Recon Scope
  • Muzzle: Bayonet, Compensator, Muzzle Brake, Suppressor
